title: Staff Software Engineer
description:
• Led critical corporate spin-off initiatives, taking on additional responsibilities in overseeing team’s future deliverables and technical direction
  • Designed full GitOps infrastructure model and transition plan, accounting for existing resources and ongoing migrations
  • Conducted architecture and code reviews for a team of over 10 engineers
  • Managed two junior developers, providing guidance and mentorship in cloud technologies

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
• Designed and implemented an infrastructure-as-code template framework, decreasing development time from weeks to days
  • Fully automated the resource deployment process for new applications, eliminating manual efforts and reducing turnaround times by 75%
  • Developed backend APIs for dynamically running large-scale ML compute jobs, involving millions of service technician records and machine sensor data

title: Digital Technology Leadership Program
description:
• GE’s premier talent development program focusing on technical skills and project management
  • Coordinated international teams in 4 countries to roll out biometric authentication for factory workers, presented findings to executive team
  • Implemented new core data table view with fully customizable filters and sorting, collaborating with UX designer on solutions
  • Built integration between CRM tool and HR database system, including unit and performance testing

title: Software Developer (Co-op)
description:
• Led team for Alexa voice integration MVP for monitoring agile sprints/task events from planning tool
  • Built backend REST API for interfacing between personnel management application and HR databases
  • Conducted 7 education sessions for onboarding new hires on internal technologies and processes
  • Took initiative in proposing, organizing, and leading site-wide engagement events with 100+ participants

title: Full Stack Developer (Co-op)
description:
• Developed new features on ASP.NET web application in an accelerated environment
  • Enhanced user experience and reduced page reload frequency significantly (30% improvement)
  • Implemented asynchronous actions throughout the site, utilizing ASP’s update objects and AJAX
  • Maintained stored database procedures, eliminating redundant queries and optimizing performance
